text: is a railway freight terminal in the city of Fukui, Japan. It is located on the Hokuriku Main Line between Echizen-Hanandō and Fukui Stations. It is operated by Japan Freight Railway Company (JR Freight). It was opened on December 1, 1952. ==Surrounding area== *Taiheiyo Cement - Fukui Service Station *Sumitomo-Osaka Cement - Minami-Fukui Service Station ==See also== * List of railway stations in Japan ==External links== Category:Fukui (city) Category:Stations of Japan Freight Railway Company Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1952 Category:Railway stations in Fukui Prefecture
title: Minami-Fukui Freight Terminal
